Metadata.Title: CVE-2021-46023 affecting package nghttp2 for versions less than 1.57.0-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2021-46023 affecting package nghttp2 for versions less than 1.57.0-1. This CVE either no longer is or was never applicable.

Criterion.Comment: Package nghttp2 is installed with version 1.46.0-3 or earlier
